author: gakonst
content: You can create a blob aggregation service

author: 0xevan
content: For sure. Just, by default the blob aggregation service doesn't exist **yet**

author: 0xevan
content: That's what I was trying to get at

author: gakonst
content: Yup, nor the blob archival service for rollup sync from l1 w/ expired blobs

author: ajsutton
content: Bear in mind that roll ups can generally choose to delay posting to L1 in order to fill a blob themselves which is much simpler than trying to coordinate across different L2s.

author: 0xevan
content:
Right.

They could also choose to partially fill a blob and pad the rest of the tx with 0s to send right away. Even a half filled blob would be more than sufficient because the data costs are lowered so much (assuming blob gas market is below target blob count)
